liquibase.database
Interface DatabaseConnection

All Known Implementing Classes:
DerbyConnectionDelegate, HsqlConnectionDelegate, SQLConnectionDelegate, SybaseConnectionDelegate
public interface DatabaseConnection

A liquibase abstraction over the normal Connection that is available in java.sql. This interface allows wrappers and aspects over the basic connection.

Author:
Paul Keeble
See Also:
SybaseConnectionDelegate, SQLConnectionDelegate
